description: Wraps the Trimmomatic command-line tool for Illumina read trimming and adapter removal. Supports both paired-end ('PE') and single-end ('SE') modes.
name: run_trimmomatic

required_parameters.name: trimmomatic_exec
required_parameters.description: Full path to the Trimmomatic executable (JAR file or shim script).

required_parameters.name: mode
required_parameters.description: Trimmomatic mode: 'PE' for paired-end or 'SE' for single-end.

optional_parameters.name: R1_in
optional_parameters.description: Path to the first input FASTQ file (required for PE mode).

optional_parameters.name: R2_in
optional_parameters.description: Path to the second input FASTQ file (required for PE mode).

optional_parameters.name: R1_paired
optional_parameters.description: Path to the output FASTQ file for paired reads from the first input (required for PE mode).

optional_parameters.name: R1_unpaired
optional_parameters.description: Path to the output FASTQ file for unpaired reads from the first input (required for PE mode).

optional_parameters.name: R2_paired
optional_parameters.description: Path to the output FASTQ file for paired reads from the second input (required for PE mode).

optional_parameters.name: R2_unpaired
optional_parameters.description: Path to the output FASTQ file for unpaired reads from the second input (required for PE mode).

optional_parameters.name: fastq_in
optional_parameters.description: Path to the input FASTQ file (required for SE mode).

optional_parameters.name: fastq_out
optional_parameters.description: Path to the output FASTQ file (required for SE mode).

optional_parameters.name: adapters_path
optional_parameters.description: Path to the adapter sequences file.

optional_parameters.name: leading
optional_parameters.description: LEADING: Cut bases off the start of a read, if below a threshold.

optional_parameters.name: trailing
optional_parameters.description: TRAILING: Cut bases off the end of a read, if below a threshold.

optional_parameters.name: slidingwindow
optional_parameters.description: SLIDINGWINDOW: Perform a sliding window trimming, cutting when the average quality within the window falls below a threshold.

optional_parameters.name: minlen
optional_parameters.description: MINLEN: Drop reads below a specified length.

optional_parameters.name: extra_args
optional_parameters.description: List of additional arguments to pass to Trimmomatic.

description: Runs the FastQC tool to perform quality control checks on raw sequencing data. It analyzes FASTQ files and generates an HTML report with QC metrics.
name: run_fastqc

required_parameters.name: input_file
required_parameters.description: Path to the input FASTQ file.

optional_parameters.name: output_dir
optional_parameters.description: Path to the output directory where FastQC reports will be saved. If not specified, the report will be saved in the same directory as the input file.

optional_parameters.name: threads
optional_parameters.description: Number of threads to use for FastQC.
